snippet: China is imposing a blizzard of restrictions to ensure stability during a major leadership change, and its crackdown extends even to toys and the back seats of cabs.
abstract: Chinese government has outlined series of restrictions, on items including internet access, regularly scheduled business and what people can bring into the streets with them, to ensure stability during its 18th Party Congress leadership change.
lead_paragraph: China is imposing a blizzard of restrictions to ensure stability during a major leadership change, and its crackdown extends even to toys and the back seats of cabs.

headline.seo: China’s Heavy Hand Smooths Way to Party Congress
headline.main: From Toys to TV News, Jittery Beijing Clamps Down
headline.print_headline: Restrictions Pave Path To a Transition in China

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
